candidate. At the time, U.S. senators were elected by state legislatures; thus

question: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew reports from the Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library in Springfield, IL.)  On September 15th, 1858, in Jonesboro, Illinois, Abraham Lincoln used these notes to organize his thoughts in the third of his seven debates with this sitting U.S. senator
